StarFlier::

She heard a noise outside the ship and woke up.  She listened and 
sniffed the air. SOmething new was around.  She called out from 
inside the ship. "Hello? WHo's there?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm:
> 
> Starstorm aarrived to the place and she was aaround the fallen 
ship, 
> expecting that she wasnt leaded to a trap 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > StarFlier slept in dragon mode.  Her power cells recharged as 
they 
> > always did when she slept.  She awoke to the sound of the alarm 
> going 
> > off from her trip lazars.  She jumped and looked around.  She saw 
a 
> > large animal. It was about 6 and a half feet tall. Massive branch 
> > like things sticking out of it's large elongated head.  It's legs 
> > were very long and very thin. It had dark brown skin and fur.  
What 
> > she saw was a moose, but since she had never seen one before, it 
> > looked like a monster. It was larger than her, but she knew she 
> could 
> > take on anything she had seen so far in the woods.  She reset her 
> > little alarm system and laid back down and went to sleep. 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
